title: Is Zed ban worthy?
body:
What do you guys think? I'm kinda torn. 

If he isn't ban worthy as a generally strong champ, is he ban worthy in my specific situation?

Okay, so in solo Ranked, my go to role is Mid. And my go to champion is Fizz. Now he's banned a lot, so when he is, my second in line is Syndra. And Zed, hard counters Syndra, or so I've heard. I don't know if this is true, but all I know is that I always tend to do horribly with playing a Zed as Syndra. No matter what, I can't pinpoint exactly what it is though, it's definitely not the fact that he can dodge my ult as I almost always leave my Q+E stun till last in my combo, just before I Ult.

Another thing is, when I'm playing other champs against Zed, I seem to sometimes do fine and sometimes get rekt. Zeds seem to be 50/50 with their skill level. Sometimes I wreck Zeds, sometimes Zeds wreck me. And even when I DO wreck him in lane, when he roams, no matter how many times I ping or type in chat, some people on Solo Queue just don't listen. 

Lastly, EVERYONE plays Zed, and to be completely and utterly honest, I would ban him just so I can verse someone else in Mid for a change. I get really really really bored of versing Zeds in mid.

replies.body:
Zed can hard carry games if played right. You could be ahead, but once Zed gets a triple kill, it's game over.
I always ban Zed. He is literally cancer.

I'm an ADC main so you should probably understand the pain of having to verse him.

He doesn't 'hard' counter Syndra....that i'm sure of...nothing of Zed's really hard counter's Syndra unless you let him in range of his ult when you ult him or something. Yours is 675 - 750 and his is 625.

Its not a hard counter but it is a soft counter, Zed's ult makes him untargetable so if he times it right he can reduce Syndra's ult damage (or all of it not sure) by a lot, he can also make Syndra's CC worthless because of his shadows, so he may not be a hard counter but he can counter her.

Hahaha I'm kidding xD Yeah that's what I was thinking of doing. And plus, I feel like Fizz outduels Zed HARD pre AND post 6.

Well its best to ban something that you struggle to face and also general overpowered champs, for example i main top Rengar so my ban is Janna because she has broken peels, second ban is usually Irelia because she gets to a certain point where i cannot go near her and i'm forced to just leave lane and give up, she outscales me really fast too no matter how far ahead i am, third ban is whatever i feel like, maybe Fizz because i think hes overpowered and also a pain in the ass for everyone, might be Fiora occasionally because again shes similar to Irelia, you get the point.

Basically, if you feel that Zed is a problem for you then you ban him, however if you feel that you can deal with him then ban something stronger than him, i personally don't ban Zed because he isn't a problem for me.

For your situation id ban him if your going syndra or fizz there are so many people maining zed these days and they are good why take the chance of them being a good zed XD if your gonna mid ban him first then think on other snowballers like kat for example hope my opinion helps though im not the greatest player XD
